医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
微针为治疗糖尿病伤口提供了一种有前景的解决方案到 2030 年，全球患有糖尿病伤口的患者人数预计将增加到 910 万至 2610 万。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Microneedles-offer-a-promising-solution-for-the-treatment-of-diabetic-wounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Microneedles-offer-a-promising-solution-for-the-treatment-of-diabetic-wounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb50530b-77ae-40cc-be26-5b0a790cf5b8 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 15:49:59 -0400 Microneedles offer a promising solution for the treatment of diabetic wounds
研究表明，基于种族、民族和地点的痴呆症诊断存在障碍华盛顿州立大学研究人员领导的一项研究表明，对任何人来说，诊断痴呆症都是一个漫长而困难的过程，但有些人可能会因种族或民族以及居住地而面临额外的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Study-shows-barriers-to-dementia-diagnosis-based-on-race-ethnicity-and-location.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Study-shows-barriers-to-dementia-diagnosis-based-on-race-ethnicity-and-location.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7e6de2e-96b5-4e37-a1c2-7c73c56b6887 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 15:42:52 -0400 Study shows barriers to dementia diagnosis based on race, ethnicity, and location
基于人工智能的移动应用程序可以非常高精度地诊断黑色素瘤一款使用人工智能来分析可疑皮肤病变图像的移动应用程序可以非常高精度地诊断黑色素瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/AI-based-mobile-app-can-diagnose-melanoma-with-very-high- precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/AI-based-mobile-app-can-diagnose-melanoma-with-very-high- precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35525428-fbc8-4506-8256-14570c25c995 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 15:23:00 -0400 AI-based mobile app can diagnose melanoma with very high precision
SARS-CoV-2 相关 ARDS 无需直接感染即可损害心脏美国国立卫生研究院支持的一项研究发现，引起 COVID-19 的病毒 SARS-CoV-2 即使不直接感染心脏组织也会损害心脏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/SARS-CoV-2-linked-ARDS-can-damage-the-heart-without-direct-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/SARS-CoV-2-linked-ARDS-can-damage-the-heart-without-direct-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=228fc747-437f-46f6-b7a5-0aeb00198a55 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 15:11:21 -0400 SARS-CoV-2-associated ARDS can damage the heart without direct infection
研究人员开发了一种经济有效的方法来空间表征和绘制大脑表观基因组图据美国大脑基金会称，全世界估计有六分之一的人患有脑部疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Researchers-develop-a-cost-efficient-method-to-spatially-characterize-and-map-brain-epigenomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Researchers-develop-a-cost-efficient-method-to-spatially-characterize-and-map-brain-epigenomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b8bd04b-0c5a-4f37-910f-146852439ce2 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 15:01:00 -0400 Researchers develop a cost-effective method to spatially characterize and map brain epigenomes
经常摄入含糖饮料、果汁与男孩患 2 型糖尿病的风险较高有关初步研究显示，一项对马萨诸塞州近 500 名儿童进行的小型长期研究发现，在儿童期和青春期经常饮用含糖饮料和 100% 果汁可能与男孩患 2 型糖尿病的风险高于女孩有关将于 3 月 18 日至 21 日在芝加哥举行的 2024 年美国心脏协会流行病学和预防│生活方式和心脏代谢科学会议上发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Regular-intake-of-sugary-drinks-fruit-juices-tied-to-higher-Type-2-diabetes-risk-in-boys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Regular-intake-of-sugary-drinks-fruit-juices-tied-to-higher-Type-2-diabetes-risk-in-boys.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf100d2f-bcfd-41c9-9db3-650efe3dbf6d Wed, 20 Mar 2024 14:58:41 -0400 Regular intake of sugary drinks, fruit juices tied to higher Type 2 diabetes risk in boys

基因测试可以确定三阴性早期乳腺癌患者对免疫治疗的反应研究人员开发了一种基因测试，可以确定三阴性早期乳腺癌患者对免疫治疗药物的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Genetic-test-can-identify-how-患者-with-triple-阴性-early-stage-breast-cancer-will-respond-to-immunotherapy。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Genetic-test-can-identify-how-患者-with-triple-阴性-early-stage-breast-cancer-will-respond-to-immunotherapy。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88c60607-79ed-415c-a6df-4fa49d45fbfb Wed, 20 Mar 2024 14:01:37 -0400 Genetic test can identify how patients with triple negative early-stage breast cancer will respond to immunotherapy
无论年龄或绝经状况如何，派姆单抗均可增强乳腺癌治疗KEYNOTE-756 3 期临床试验的新数据表明，在乳腺癌手术前后的化疗中添加免疫治疗药物 pembrolizumab 可以为患者带来更好的结果，无论患者年龄或绝经状况如何。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Pembrolizumab-enhances-breast-cancer-treatment-regardless-of-age-or-menopausal-status.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Pembrolizumab-enhances-breast-cancer-treatment-regardless-of-age-or-menopausal-status.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c91f9d38-c1bc-4681-8a2c-847eb8f0241c Wed, 20 Mar 2024 13:56:59 -0400 Pembrolizumab enhances breast cancer treatment regardless of age or menopausal status
